text: Antonello da Messina (born 1429 or 1430 in Messina â€“ died 1479) was an Italian painter from the 15th century. His real name was Antonio di Giovanni de Antonio, the da Messina simply refers to his origin. He was the first to use light in his paintings. With this, he was able to add some of what the Dutch painters of the time did already. Today, he is mostly known for portraits. ==Related pages== * List of Italian painters Category:Italian painters Category:People from Messina Category:1430s births Category:1479 deaths
title: Antonello da Messina
